description:
积土成山，积水成渊。再好的文章都是由一句句话覆叠而成的，所谓聚沙成塔，我们要写好每一句话，才能写出来高质量的作文。英语学习本没有“诀窍”可言，只有“通顺”和“地道”的层次区别。本文汇总各种句式，来帮助大家写出地道英语句子。

雅思写作：写出地道英语句子>>

雅思写作：“观点”例句20则>>
英语学习本没有“诀窍”可言，只有“通顺”和“地道”的层次区别。本文通过比较汉英语言差别，来帮助大家写出地道英语句子。 雅思写作中必然要谈及自己的观点，然而很多同学都在为怎么描写观点而忧愁。下面小编就介绍了好几种方法供同学们选择，避免写作的时候显得枯燥无味。
详解雅思写作中的句法误区>> 雅思写作中的同义词句转换>>
备考雅思的同学普遍的“软肋”在写作上，固然写作得高分比较难，但是拿到及格分是不难的。下面小编汇集了大家在句法中存在的误区和应对的方法和大家一同探讨~ 同义词句转换是在写作中非常重要也是考生必备的一个技能。经常有学生在写文章时，不懂得同义词替换，总是反反复复用同一个词或句型表达，令读者感觉很啰嗦，文章也显得很幼稚，必然拿不到高分。因此，专家介绍了几种同义词/句转换的方法，供大家参考。
雅思写作：雅思阅读中感动的语句>> 雅思写作9大亮点句型>>
文中选自雅思阅读中的十句令人感动的语句，这些语句可以用于雅思写作中，也可以套用这些句型在写作中使用，让自己的作文富有文采、表达地道、语法正确。 雅思多变好句型，引几位考官竞折腰。雅思考场上各位筒子们的各种幻想各种心声。记住本文为你准备的简单精巧雅思句型，等着让你那从未谋面的考官眼前一亮，对你想见无缘吧。
突破雅思写作瓶颈之“There be”句型综合症>> 雅思写作技巧：长短句>>
There be句型是考生在写作中易犯错误的一个句型，经常会按照汉语的思维习惯套在英语句子中，导致语法错误。文中指导考生应该如何正确使用there be 句型。 在修改雅思作文的过程中，发现同学们总是爱走极端。有的同学通篇都是简单句，有的同学则用艰涩的长句上瘾。那种长短句穿插，读起来行云流水，音乐版抑扬顿挫的好文章，不就是我们所寻找的。
英文倒装句用法解析>> 雅思写作的七种表达句式>>
倒装(Inversion)是一种语法手段,用以表示一定句子结构的需要和强调某一句子成分的需要。英语的最基本结构是主、谓结构,倒装就是将这种比较固定的结构加以颠倒。 雅思写作中表达句式是非常重要的，有什么需要的表达句式吗？有什么可以在考试中用到的句式吗啊？下面小编汇总了雅思写作中常用的表达句式，它们在短文写作中有很高的使用率。
雅思写作常用句式>> 雅思写作重点：单词+句型>>
文中总结了雅思写作中使用率最高、覆盖面最广的句式，按照表达的内容将这些句式分类，帮助考生变换不同的方式表达一种意思，让你的作文不再单调。 本文从单词和句型两方面入手，指导考生如何提高雅思写作水平，让考生避免误区，注意写作的侧重点和重点，这样才能顺利通过雅思写作考试，赢得高分。
雅思写作中的定语从句>> 雅思小作文：模板必备50句型>>
从句是很重要的句型，并且在雅思写作中的使用率比较高，定语从句的使用能为文章增添很多色彩，下面小编就为大家介绍一下雅思考试中应该如何更好的写出几句定语从句。 雅思小作文的图表题其实也是有模版可循的，一些句型在分析数据的变化规律时是一定会用到的，这篇文章为大家详细总结了常用必背句型，希望大家挑几个背下来，一定能对你的写作速度和质量有帮助。
雅思写作：定语从句的运用>> 雅思写作：引言段背景句的写法>>
英语的语法总是让不少同学感到头疼，但其实语法并不难。从句中用的最多的便是定语从句，而其在雅思写作中也是作用很大，考生应该时刻提醒自己利用定语从句把一个简单句变的高深莫测。 雅思作文中，作文开头的引言段是非常重要的。其不仅能快速地吸引考官的眼球，更能帮助考生轻松赢取作文高分。但是如何才可以让考官眼前一亮呢？本文介绍了引言段的几种写法，让你不再为作文开头而犯愁。
如何写好背景句【雅思写作】>> 雅思作文高分必备经典20句>>
雅思作文背景句应该怎么写？这是很多考生困扰的地方。怎样写出一个好的开头而让考官眼前一亮？下面介绍了几种方法供同学们选择。 雅思写作有规律可循，掌握一些有用的句型，对你的写作必然是有百益而无害的，跟着小编一起来看下吧。

title: 雅思写作炼句：聚沙成塔

description:
唐伯虎带你玩转英文口语（13）--音乐
时间：6月2日（星期一） 13:00 - 14:00
主讲老师：唐伯虎（点击关注老师的沪江部落>>>）
公开课地点：英语大厅（点击下载CCTalk）

讲师简介：

Flora
四川外语学院英语翻译学学士，英语专业八级，03年全国翻译资格CATTI三级口译译员，并具备国家二级翻译水平。拥有近10年的英语教学经验，曾先后在天津、北京、宁波等城市的知名英语培训学校担任教学主管。何老师对英语教育有自己独到的见解和方法，在吸取了各地的英语教学先进理念的基础上，自创了独特的词汇学习法，能够使各个年龄层次的学员在短时间内深刻记住并灵活运用所学到的单词，久久不忘；“立体发音课”，学员几次课学会所有单词的正确拼读；摒弃了传统而枯燥的语法背诵，用简单的公式和“连锁训练”让学员造句信手拈来。
点击关注老师沪江部落>>>>


视频回顾：

课堂内容提要：

Warming up
-Do you like music? What kind of music do you like best?
-What do you think can music bring people?
-Do you like to listen to fast songs or slow ones? Why?
-What is your favorite song? When did you listen to it? How has it affected you? What is your story of the song?

Music We Like 
-Music is a universal language in the world. It oversteps people’s ethnicities, languages or cultures and conveys the feeling of musicians to listeners. People can not only lose themselves in melody but also get the emotional and spiritual resonance from music. Different people like different kinds of music. For example, people who like fast rhythm appreciate rock music; people who seek peaceful and comfortable feeling enjoy country music; people who want to explore inner world admire classical music. Each kind of music has its own characteristics. They arouse a large amount of affection of listeners and make us like them.
-Rock music with fast rhythm makes people excited, liberates their passion and can be remembered by listeners in a short time. Rock music is a genre of popular music that originated as “rock and roll”. It comes from blues, R&B and jazz. Many famous rock bands always take the music scene by storm all over the world. As a well-known rock band in American, Linkin Park is sought after by enthusiastic rock music fans. Their songs, What I Have Done, New Divide and Iridescent, were used in soundtrack for the series films of Transformers, and the three songs became popular in many countries. With fast rhythm, rock music is sung and fond of by many people who want the pursuit of excitement, enthusiasm and adventure in their life.
-Country music is a kind of fluent and soft music that makes us feel sincere, peaceful and comfortable. It is a type of American popular music that originated in the rural regions of the Southern United States. We can take its roots from southeastern American folk music. When we hear country music, it feels like that there is a clear river in hometown flowing before us slightly. This feeling makes us more pure and reminds us of the affection of missing our home. The music also sounds so kind as we come back to hometown and see our dear relatives and friends.
Numerous songs arouse our homesick such as one remarkable song named country road take me home singed by John Denver. According to country music, we can perceive the warm feeling of hometown and the relaxing rhythm leads us to get lost into the beautiful music.

-Do you want to recommend some beautiful songs to us?

description:
《穹顶之下》S02E03剧情简介：

In "Force Majeure," Big Jim conducts a census to see how long the town can survive on dwindling resources; acid rain threatens everyone on an all-new episode of "Under the Dome" airing Monday, July 14, 2014 at 10 p.m. ET/PT on CBS.在《穹顶之下》第二季第三集《Force Majeure》中，Big Jim做了一次人口调查，了解磨坊镇在农作物产量降低的情况下，可以支撑多久；在新的一集中，酸雨把镇里的每个人都吓到了。新一集的《穹顶之下》将会在 2014年7月14日开播。

description:
沪江英乐：南岸大佬 T.I. 联手澳洲爆红饶舌女歌手 Iggy Azalea 最新单曲《No Mediocre》！MV在巴西里约热内卢拍摄完成，里约人民绚丽清凉的夏装与丰腴的小麦色胴体，时刻都在提醒我们夏日就该如此毫不拘束。

【T.I. 联手 Iggy Azalea 最新单曲《No Mediocre》】

歌词：

[Hook: T.I.]
All I fuck is bad bitches
I don’t want no mediocre (x3) no
Bad bitches only
Ain't no mediocre
Don’t want no mediocre
I won’t hit no mediocre
You a bad bitch
Stuntin on the mediocre (x3)
7 bitches with me and ain't none of them mediocre
From they head to they toes they so far from mediocre

[Verse 1: T.I.]
Right hand in the air
I solemnly swear
I never fuck a bitch if she don’t do her hair
No more, you won’t get no dick if there’s a bush down there
Girl I should see nothing but pussy when I look down there
You come fuck with a nigga what better to do
He call to ask how you doin tell him better than you, yeah
I’m kicked back with four pieces like a kit kat
Me fucking if you ain’t a dime, just forget that
Pretty face fat ass, if she don’t have
Have one of these, well I think I’ll pass
I just handed her the keys to a new drop Jag
When she took it I took it back
You shoulda asked for a Benz
That’s mediocre bitch

[Hook: T.I.]

[Verse 2: Iggy Azalea]
Heard he want to lay it down on Iggy Iggy
Gave it to him twice
Now he want a 3, Mike Bibby diva
But I need a bad boy
Rest in peace Whitney pardon me
But I don’t think none of these bitches fucking with me
Want a billboard bitch stop running in place
Heels on me saying gimme 6 inches of space
Courtside while designer frames cover my face
Now everybody in the game wanna get em a taste
I’m still Grand Hustle first lady fuck you pay me
Bet he won't go 12 rounds with the million dollar baby
I can change your life quick stop playing with me
And if you ain't talking money what you saying to me

[Hook: T.I.]

[Verse 3: T.I.]
I'm in Brazil with a bitch
Catch me in a mansion in the hills with a bitch
Get her out dem tennis shoes
Throw some heels on a bitch
I’m the type of nigga split a mil with a bitch
Hold up, only if she bad though
Out here trying to find someone that better than my last go
Take her to my castle
Drown her in my cash flow
Say your dick so little she can fit it in her asshole
Told me she can write this shit
No further than a cab go
Said I got that don dick
She wanna be my tutor
So she give me brain getting head on the scooter
Had sex on the beach
From Bermuda up to Cuba
I done fucked a lot of dimes
But I’m looking for a cute bitch
You the shit
What she say when she got to sit
When I ain't around
Give a damn who you do it with
Super thick pretty face
Ménage à veinte
20 at the same time
Wanna get ya rent paid
